document_data.name: Essard
document_data.mainbody: '''Essard''' was a guest at the [[Open Feast]] of {{yearlink|1479}} held at [[Castle Obarskyr]] in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Relationships: Per another guest, Essard had servants, some of which may have kin who worked at the palace.
document_data.History: At the [[Open Feast]] held at [[Castle Obarskyr]] in [[Mirtul 26]] of the {{yearlink|1479}}, Essard asked why there still was a haunted wing at the Royal Palace of [[Suzail]], and why it hadn't been un-haunted with spells or faith. It was explained to them that it had been tried, but it just wouldn't take.
